name: Lovecraft Academy Demo
description:
ADVENTURE OF A LIFETIME! Leo Paine, son of the famous American millionaire, finds himself thousands of miles from home, at school in Britain! Surrounded by handsome British boys (and a foreign prince), Leo is set to have a gay old time, as long as his sister doesn't cause trouble!

But maybe he should beware, because there have been queer goings on up at that there old school...

Demo Features:

  • 7500 words;
  • At least five cute boys to befriend... and maybe more?
  • Classic pulp school/horror setting;
  • An annoying sister.

Note: While I will still keep working on this, it will be secondary compared to my main project, the text-based interactive fiction story The One Chosen.
